com.bluegosling.concurrent

Class WrappingExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bluegosling.concurrent.WrappingExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContextPropagatingExecutor, InterceptingExecutor, WrappingExecutorService

    public abstract class WrappingExecutor
extends Object
implements Executor
    An executor that provides a way to wrap tasks that are executed. Wrappers can perform a range of cross-cutting concerns before and after delegating to the wrapped task.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected WrappingExecutor(Executor delegate)
      Constructs a new executor that delegates to the given executor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Executor delegate()
      Returns the underlying executor.
      void execute(Runnable command) 
      protected abstract Runnable wrap(Runnable r)
      Wraps the given task.

        protected Executor delegate()

      • wrap

        protected abstract Runnable wrap(Runnable r)
        Wraps the given task. This is called for each task executed.
        Parameters:
        r - a task
        Returns:
        a wrapper around the given task that will be executed in its place
